episodes.title: 2-D Blacktop
episodes.plot: After Planet Express ship is scrapped, professor saves it from the junkyard and rebuilds it into a super racer. But an accident during a race sends the ship into a two-dimensional universe.

episodes.title: Fry and Leela's Big Fling
episodes.plot: Fry and Leela try to have some private time, but no matter where they go someone gets in their way. Finally they pay for a secluded romantic getaway, which turns out to be even worse.

episodes.title: T.: The Terrestrial
episodes.plot: The crew goes to Omicron Persei 8, where Fry is left behind, and rescued by a local boy, but his only wish is to go home.

episodes.title: Forty Percent Leadbelly
episodes.plot: Bender finally fulfills his dream of becoming a folk singer by creating a copy of a famous guitar, but then something goes terribly wrong.

episodes.title: The Inhuman Torch
episodes.plot: Bender accidentally becomes a firefighting hero, and loves it so much that he becomes a full-time firefighter. And he has plenty of opportunities to display his heroism, because fires mysteriously start everywhere he goes.

episodes.title: Saturday Morning Fun Pit
episodes.plot: President Nixon is watching his favorite TV shows, which spoof three actual cartoon series using Futurama characters.

episodes.title: Calculon 2.0
episodes.plot: Fry and Bender resurrect Calculon to make "All My Circuits" interesting again. But things don't go exactly as planned.

episodes.title: Assie Come Home
episodes.plot: Bender searches the entire universe for his shiny metal rear end.

episodes.title: Leela and the Genestalk
episodes.plot: After a rare condition causes Leela to grow tentacles, she stumbles upon a secret genetic engineering facility.

episodes.title: Game of Tones
episodes.plot: The Planet Express crew journeys into Fry's dreams to pull off a mission in the year 1999.

episodes.title: Murder on the Planet Express
episodes.plot: The crew get trapped aboard the Planet Express ship with a horrific alien creature.

episodes.title: Stench and Stenchibility
episodes.plot: Zoidberg's budding romance with a flower shop owner who cannot smell his unpleasant odor is tested when he's given the opportunity to give her a nose transplant.

episodes.title: Meanwhile
episodes.plot: Professor Farnsworth invents a button that can take a person 10 seconds back in time, inadvertently causing major consequences.
